1612.text: Derek knows one book by Angela Carter,

1613.text: which is Nights At The Circus...

1617.text:
- ..so we're going to go with that. 
- OK.

1619.text:
- Let's see if you're right. Are they? 
- We don't know, to be honest.

1622.text: I don't think it's Nights At The Circus,

1624.text: but I may be entirely wrong about that.

1626.text: It may be something like Company Of Wolves.

1627.text: No, it's neither, actually. It's The Magic Toyshop.

1632.text:
- Never heard of it. 
- The Magic Toyshop, 1967.

1639.text: Which US state, the fifth largest in area,

1645.text:
- New Mexico. 
- New Mexico. 
- It's New Mexico, isn't it?

1648.text: That would be about the fifth biggest.

1650.text:
- Yeah. 
- Well, immediately east of Arizona is New Mexico.

1654.text: If you've got this right, you've won.

1656.text: Immediately east of Arizona is New Mexico.

1667.text: Well, that was a stinker, The Magic Toyshop.

1671.text: Very sorry. Hope you've enjoyed playing.

1673.text:
- It's been marvellous. 
- It's been a good game. 
- Been a great game.

1676.text: Great quizzers. You were taking them apart.

1678.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally,

1680.text: gained a bit of their bounce back.

1681.text: They reign supreme again in quiz land.

1684.text: It does mean you won't be going home with the £2,000,

1686.text: so the money rolls over to our next show.

1690.text: Just starting to look a little bit unbeatable again.

1694.text: Join us next time to see if a new team of Challengers

1697.text: have the brains to defeat the Eggheads.

1699.text: £3,000 says they don't. Till then, goodbye.
